subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Wearing throwback sweaters in below freezing temperatures, the Detroit Red Wings and the Chicago Blackhawks brought their N.H.L. rivalry outdoors in front of 40,000 people.
snippet: Wearing throwback sweaters in below freezing temperatures, the Detroit Red Wings and the Chicago Blackhawks brought their N.H.L. rivalry outdoors in front of 40,000 people.
